task.title: Building a bird house
task.shortdesc: Building a birdhouse is a perfect activity for adults to share with their children or grandchildren. It can be used to teach about birds, as well as the proper use of tools.

taskbody.prereq:
To build a sound birdhouse, you will need a complete set of tools:
hand saw
hammer ...
taskbody.context:
Birdhouses provide safe locations for birds to build nests and raise their young. They also provide shelter during cold and rainy spells.
Test of draft comment: Draft comment in codeph.

step.cmd: Lay out the dimensions for the birdhouse elements.
Drill a 1 1/2" diameter hole for the bird entrance on the front.
step.info: You need to look at the drawing for the correct placement of the hole.

steptroubleshooting.p: If an error message displays during the system backup, locate the error ID in the Troubleshooting Guide and follow the instructions there.

taskbody.result: You now have a beautiful new birdhouse!
